SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDINTERACTION_ANNUALPHOTOUPDATE_FROMITEMLISTXML
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: This is used to retrieve the Child Lookup ID and the Actual Date of the Annual Photo
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Trucmai Gupta
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDINTERACTION_ANNUALPHOTOUPDATE_FROMITEMLISTXML( @ITEMLISTXML xml = null ) returns table as -- do work here and return a value return (SELECT T.c.value('(ID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'CHILDLOOKUPID', T.c.value('(ACTUALDATE)[1]','date') AS 'ACTUALDATE', T.c.value('(COMPLETEINTERACTIONPROCESSID)[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') AS 'COMPLETEINTERACTIONPROCESSID' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/PHOTOINTERACTION/ITEM') T(c) )
